explanation: The original code compared K[2] and K[3], which checks the last two elements; that is wrong for detecting two distinct values that each appear twice. For a sorted list of four numbers, the correct check is whether the two middle elements differ (K[1] != K[2]) which is true exactly when the multiset is of the form [a, a, b, b]. I fixed the index comparison to K[1] != K[2].
